class Solution(object):

    def __init__(self, nums):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        """
        self.nums=nums
        self.arr=nums
        

    def reset(self):
        """
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        self.nums[:]=self.arr
        return self.nums
        

    def shuffle(self):
        """
        :rtype: List[int]
        """
        ans=self.arr[:]
        random.shuffle(ans)
        return ans
        
        
    """ def __init__(self, nums: List[int]):

        random.shuffle(ans)
